# iosxr_performance_measurement_delay_profile (Data Source)

This data source can read the Performance Measurement Delay Profile configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_performance_measurement_delay_profile" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `endpoint_default` (Boolean) Default profile
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_accelerated` (Boolean) Endpoint delay profile advertisement accelerated
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_accelerated_minimum_change` (Number) Accelerated advertisement minimum change
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_accelerated_threshold` (Number) Accelerated advertisement threshold
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_anomaly_check_lower_bound` (Number) Anomaly Check advertisement lower-bound
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_anomaly_check_upper_bound` (Number) Anomaly Check advertisement upper-bound
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_anomaly_loss_upper_bound` (Number) Anomaly Loss advertisement upper-bound
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_logging_delay_exceeded` (Boolean) Emit syslog when the delay exceeds the threshold
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_periodic_disabled` (Boolean) Periodic advertisement disabled
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_periodic_interval` (Number) Periodic advertisement and metric aggregation interval
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_periodic_minimum_change` (Number) Periodic advertisement minimum change (compared to last advertisement)
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_periodic_threshold` (Number) Periodic advertisement threshold (compared to last advertisement)
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_threshold_check_average_delay` (Boolean) Enable average-delay threshold-check
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_threshold_check_maximum_delay` (Boolean) Enable maximum-delay threshold-check
- `endpoint_default_advertisement_threshold_check_minimum_delay` (Boolean) Enable minimum-delay threshold-check
- `endpoint_default_probe_computation_interval` (Number) Interval for metric computation
- `endpoint_default_probe_flow_label_explicit` (Boolean) explicit list of flow labels
- `endpoint_default_probe_flow_label_explicit_list` (List of Number) explicit list of flow labels
- `endpoint_default_probe_flow_label_from` (Number) Lower bound
- `endpoint_default_probe_flow_label_increment` (Number) Increment
- `endpoint_default_probe_flow_label_to` (Number) Upper bound
- `endpoint_default_probe_measurement_mode_loopback` (Boolean) Loopback the probe packet collecting only timestamp 1 and 4
- `endpoint_default_probe_measurement_mode_one_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1 and 2
- `endpoint_default_probe_measurement_mode_two_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1, 2, 3 and 4 without clock synchronization
- `endpoint_default_probe_sweep_destination_ipv4` (String) Start of the IPv4 address range
- `endpoint_default_probe_sweep_destination_range` (Number) Number of IP addresses to sweep
- `endpoint_default_probe_tos_dscp` (Number) DSCP value indicating TOS level used by protocol twamp-light
- `endpoint_default_probe_tx_interval` (Number) TX interval
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `interfaces_default` (Boolean) Default profile
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_accelerated` (Boolean) Interface delay profile advertisement accelerated
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_accelerated_minimum_change` (Number) Accelerated advertisement minimum change
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_accelerated_threshold` (Number) Accelerated advertisement threshold
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_anomaly_loss_lower_bound` (Number) Anomaly Loss advertisement lower-bound
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_anomaly_loss_upper_bound` (Number) Anomaly Loss advertisement upper-bound
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_logging_delay_exceeded` (Boolean) Emit syslog when the delay exceeds the threshold
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_periodic_disabled` (Boolean) Periodic advertisement disabled
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_periodic_interval` (Number) Periodic advertisement and metric aggregation interval
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_periodic_minimum_change` (Number) Periodic advertisement minimum change (compared to last advertisement)
- `interfaces_default_advertisement_periodic_threshold` (Number) Periodic advertisement threshold (compared to last advertisement)
- `interfaces_default_probe_computation_interval` (Number) Interval for metric computation
- `interfaces_default_probe_measurement_mode_one_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1 and 2
- `interfaces_default_probe_measurement_mode_two_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1, 2, 3 and 4 without clock synchronization
- `interfaces_default_probe_protocol_pm_mpls` (Boolean) Interface delay measurement using RFC6374 with MPLS encap
- `interfaces_default_probe_protocol_twamp_light` (Boolean) Interface delay measurement using RFC5357
- `interfaces_default_probe_tos_dscp` (Number) DSCP value indicating TOS level used by protocol twamp-light
- `interfaces_default_probe_tos_traffic_class` (Number) Traffic Class value indicating TOS level used by protocol pm-mpls
- `interfaces_default_probe_tx_interval` (Number) TX interval
- `profiles` (Attributes List) Delay profile name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--profiles))
- `sr_policy_default` (Boolean) Default profile
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_accelerated` (Boolean) SR Policy delay profile advertisement accelerated
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_accelerated_minimum_change` (Number) Accelerated advertisement minimum change
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_accelerated_threshold` (Number) Accelerated advertisement threshold
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_anomaly_check_lower_bound` (Number) Anomaly Check advertisement lower-bound
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_anomaly_check_upper_bound` (Number) Anomaly Check advertisement upper-bound
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_anomaly_loss_lower_bound` (Number) Anomaly Loss advertisement lower-bound
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_anomaly_loss_upper_bound` (Number) Anomaly Loss advertisement upper-bound
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_logging_delay_exceeded` (Boolean) Emit syslog when the delay exceeds the threshold
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_periodic_disabled` (Boolean) Periodic advertisement disabled
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_periodic_interval` (Number) Periodic advertisement and metric aggregation interval
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_periodic_minimum_change` (Number) Periodic advertisement minimum change (compared to last advertisement)
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_periodic_threshold` (Number) Periodic advertisement threshold (compared to last advertisement)
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_threshold_check_average_delay` (Boolean) Enable average-delay threshold-check
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_threshold_check_maximum_delay` (Boolean) Enable maximum-delay threshold-check
- `sr_policy_default_advertisement_threshold_check_minimum_delay` (Boolean) Enable minimum-delay threshold-check
- `sr_policy_default_probe_computation_interval` (Number) Interval for metric computation
- `sr_policy_default_probe_measurement_mode_loopback` (Boolean) Loopback the probe packet collecting only timestamp 1 and 4
- `sr_policy_default_probe_measurement_mode_one_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1 and 2
- `sr_policy_default_probe_measurement_mode_two_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1, 2, 3 and 4 without clock synchronization
- `sr_policy_default_probe_protocol_pm_mpls` (Boolean) SR Policy delay measurement using RFC6374 with MPLS encap
- `sr_policy_default_probe_protocol_twamp_light` (Boolean) SR Policy delay measurement using RFC5357
- `sr_policy_default_probe_static_delay` (Number) Configure static-delay
- `sr_policy_default_probe_sweep_destination_ipv4` (String) Start of the IPv4 address range, used by IPv4, IPv6 and NULL endpoint SR Policy
- `sr_policy_default_probe_sweep_destination_range` (Number) Number of IP addresses to sweep
- `sr_policy_default_probe_tos_dscp` (Number) DSCP value indicating TOS level used by protocol twamp-light
- `sr_policy_default_probe_tos_traffic_class` (Number) Traffic Class value indicating TOS level used by protocol pm-mpls
- `sr_policy_default_probe_tx_interval` (Number) TX interval

- `advertise_threshold_check_maximum_delay` (Boolean) Enable maximum-delay threshold-check
- `advertise_threshold_check_minimum_delay` (Boolean) Enable minimum-delay threshold-check

- `probe_flow_label_explicit_list` (List of Number) explicit list of flow labels

- `probe_flow_label_to` (Number) Upper bound

- `probe_measurement_mode_two_way` (Boolean) Measure one way delay with timestamp 1, 2, 3 and 4 without clock synchronization

- `probe_protocol_twamp_light` (Boolean) SR Policy delay measurement using RFC5357

- `probe_tos_traffic_class` (Number) Traffic Class value indicating TOS level used by protocol pm-mpls
- `probe_tx_interval` (Number) TX interval
